title: GOOD OMENS Trailer (2019)
author: KinoCheck International
comment: And the crazy thing with their acting is that they could easier switch roles. They are masterful actors
Never read the book, but I do love the actors they chose. David Tennant is always fantastic at what he does and Michael Sheen is certainly no slouch, himself.
The Doctor is finally a Ginger xD
I love the book. Hope they do it justice.
description:
Official Good Omens Series Trailer 2019 | Subscribe ➤ http://abo.yt/ki | Michael Sheen Show Trailer | Release: 2019 | More https://KinoCheck.com/serie/3x9/good-...
In 2019 the world is on the brink of an apocalypse as humanity prepares for a final judgment. But follies ensue — Aziraphale, a somewhat fussy angel, and Crowley, a demon aren’t enthusiastic about the end of the world, and can’t seem to find the Antichrist.

Good Omens (2019) is the new drama starring Michael Sheen, Michael Sheen and David Tennant.
